def count_valid_arrays(N, B):
    m = 10 * 5
    p = 10 ** 9 + 7
    f = [0] * N
    g = [0] * N
    B = [0] + B
    f[1] = 1
    g[1] = m - B[1]
    for i in range(2, N):
        g[i] = f[i - 1] * (m - max(B[i - 1], B[i] + 1) + 1)
        if B[i - 1] > B[i]:
            g[i] += g[i - 1]
        elif B[i - 1] == B[i]:
            f[i] = f[i - 1] + g[i - 1]
        else:
            f[i] = f[i - 1]
        g[i] %= p
        f[i] %= p
    ans = g[N - 1] + f[N - 1] * (m - B[N - 1] + 1)
    ans %= p
    return ans
